posters.title: AI-Driven Healthcare: Early Disease Detection Using Deep Learning
posters.abstract: A novel approach to early disease detection using deep learning models trained on medical imaging data.

posters.title: Predictive Analytics in Healthcare
posters.abstract: Implementation of predictive models for patient outcome analysis and treatment planning.

posters.title: Secure Blockchain Framework for IoT Devices
posters.abstract: Implementation of a lightweight blockchain framework designed specifically for IoT devices.

posters.title: Smart Contract Security Analysis
posters.abstract: Novel approaches to detecting vulnerabilities in smart contracts using static analysis.

posters.title: Natural Language Processing for Indian Languages
posters.abstract: Development of NLP models optimized for processing and understanding Indian languages.

posters.title: Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning
posters.abstract: Innovative approaches to transfer learning across different Indian languages.

posters.title: Quantum Computing Applications in Cryptography
posters.abstract: Exploring the potential applications of quantum computing in modern cryptographic systems.

posters.title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Implementations
posters.abstract: Implementation and analysis of post-quantum cryptographic algorithms.
